reviewed_flows: CRUD operations on projects including creating, updating, archiving, unarchiving, deleting projects, and retrieving project collaborators
CRUD operations on tasks with support for natural language due dates (e.g., 'tomorrow at 4pm', 'every Monday'), priority levels (P1-P4), labels, and recurring task patterns
Task lifecycle management including closing completed tasks, reopening tasks, and filtering active tasks by project, section, label, and priority
CRUD operations on sections within projects for organizing tasks hierarchically
CRUD operations on comments attached to tasks and projects with support for attachments
CRUD operations on personal and shared labels including creating, updating, renaming shared labels, and removing shared labels
Filtering and searching tasks using complex queries combining labels, priorities, due dates, and projects with AND/OR operators
Webhook event delivery for real-time notifications on item:added, item:updated, item:deleted, and project:added events with HMAC signature verification
Bearer token authentication and request idempotency using X-Request-Id headers for reliable task creation and updates
Natural language processing for quick task entry with automatic parsing of due dates, priorities, project assignments, and labels from task descriptions
